Package frc.controllers

Class JoystickController

java.lang.Object
frc.controllers.BaseController
frc.controllers.JoystickController
public class JoystickController
extends BaseController
This is the flight stick that we use. It has a bunch of useless buttons so its special in my heart
See Also:
BaseController, ControllerEnums.JoystickAxis, ControllerEnums.JoystickHatDirection, ControllerEnums.JoystickButtons
